metadata.title: CVE-2024-45751 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
tgt (aka Linux target framework) before 1.0.93 attempts to achieve entropyby calling rand without srand. The PRNG seed is always 1, and thus thesequence of challenges is always identical.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-45751` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tgt - 1:1.0.79-2ubuntu1.1
tgt-rbd - 1:1.0.79-2ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tgt package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.0.79-2ubuntu1.1').
